td.content: s:pt presents with 3 weeks history of moderate heart burn, moderate retrosternal chest pain and severe regurgitation. he is a white m retired aged 73 ys. o:Height 69 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Abdomen = Soft, non tender, no palpable lumps or bumps, BS (+) a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lansoprazole - 30 mg po qd x 8 week, and ordered Ambulatory PH monitoring (24 Hrs).

td.content: s:pt presents with severe vomiting, difficulty swallowing. he has history of severe regurgitation. pt is a white male retired aged 75 Ys. o:Height 69 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, HEENT = PERRLA, no palpable lymphadenopathy a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:patient c/o 7 weeks h/o severe regurgitation. NKDA. pt is a 75 yr old m. o:Height 68 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Mouth = posterior oropharyngeal erythema, diffuse dental erosions a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CBC, Barium Esophagogram.
